title: Patch 5.16's locked in place and no meaningful changes in sight
body:
It was an honor being part of this community for over three years but I guess everything has to come to an end.

~M.M

replies.body:
To all Mordekaiser mains out there: I am so, SO SORRY.

I may not have done anything to you, but I feel like somebody owes you an apology, and you aren't going to get it from CertainlyT.

Thanks bud
Ive seen mord on PBE. Hes fucking over powered. Props to CertainlyT for creating broken champions. His damage is stupid. It is ridiculous.

> [{quoted}](name=The Giratina,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=00030003,timestamp=2015-08-12T14:55:01.312+0000)

Maybe, just maybe we want a genuinely balanced champion with clear weaknesses and strengths and nothing broken that switches from broken to useless because of sheer numbers

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000300030000,timestamp=2015-08-12T14:59:27.218+0000)

> Maybe, just maybe we want a genuinely balanced champion with clear weaknesses and strengths and nothing broken that switches from broken to useless because of sheer numbers

strengths: Mad damage

Weaknesses: Gets kited to shit.

...everything looks to be in order here, idk.

> [{quoted}](name=FocusDatAshe,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=00030003000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-12T15:10:29.965+0000)
>
> Toxicity seems not to be a factor for a healthy champ anymore?
> Morde is too damn feast or famine and will always be toxic as long as his kit offers so little counterplay with abyssmal windows where skill matters more than simply having sheer number advantage.
> 
> Get CC'd= Morde recks you
> Stay out of range= Poke Morde down and destroy him
> 
> It's way too binary and offers nothing interesting.

welcome to being a melee damage pump in League of Ranged Burst CC.

> [{quoted}](name=Voidgolem,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000300030000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-12T15:24:49.519+0000)
>
> welcome to being a melee damage pump in League of Ranged Burst CC.

Mobility makes it this way.  Because there are so many super mobile champions, you need to be able to lock them in place or burst them down if they are momentarily out of position.  Further, the super mobile champions don't have to worry about getting in range of bruisers without gap closers, as they can just dash/blink/flash away if needed.  Mobility started League down this path.

> [{quoted}](name=sp441,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-12T12:49:36.151+0000)
>
> To all Mordekaiser mains out there: I am so, SO SORRY.

Thank you.

I can tell by your name that you mained Morde... I also feel sorry for you. I hope they don't do the same to {{champion:27}}, or some other iconic champ (of course they treat the rat well though {{champion:17}}, now he is the definition of a toxic lane )
We still didn't get an apology for any of his champions either.
so now, evrytime i enter a game i must say " RIP MORD ON PATCH 5.16", who is with me on this one!

I find this particular batch of complaints to be unfounded without people playing a substantial amount on live. We don't know how good or bad new Morde will be. He might be great. He might be awful. The only thing that is certain is that he'll be different. And a champion being different isn't enough reason for the sort of nihilistic response that Morde mains have been displaying on the forums for the past two weeks or so.

> [{quoted}](name=Zhugan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-08-12T15:17:59.060+0000)
>
> I find this particular batch of complaints to be unfounded without people playing a substantial amount on live. We don't know how good or bad new Morde will be. He might be great. He might be awful. The only thing that is certain is that he'll be different. And a champion being different isn't enough reason for the sort of nihilistic response that Morde mains have been displaying on the forums for the past two weeks or so.

People hate change.

> [{quoted}](name=DJ Di0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-08-12T15:32:33.242+0000)
>
> People hate change.

2 things.

1. Everyone should be able to relate to someone's favorite champion/main being alienated and changed into something so different.
Also forcing people to play him in a particular role isn't being opposed to change, it's being shocked that one's main role roster is being shaken up so hard.
I for example main Morde top and he's my go to top laner. What am I supposed to play now? I adapted my playtyle to fit into top so should I disregard everything I've learned to play bot lane or simply forget about ever wanting to play my favorite champion again?

2. I'd love to get some changes for Morde. I really do. Changes that actually strengthen his thematic and gameplay appeal and build on his character. Making him more enjoyable, healthier and overall more unique rather than reworkin one sigle ability, nerfing some others and calling it a day, not really addressing flaws and strengths and missing his personality by far.
1. You're assuming it won't still be possible to go top with him.

> [{quoted}](name=Icestar1186,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000a000000000001,timestamp=2015-08-12T15:57:56.779+0000)
>
> 1. You're assuming it won't still be possible to go top with him.

With effectively only 2 basic abilities? Good luck.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2015-08-12T15:47:30.287+0000)
>
> 2 things.
> 
> 1. Everyone should be able to relate to someone's favorite champion/main being alienated and changed into something so different.
> Also forcing people to play him in a particular role isn't being opposed to change, it's being shocked that one's main role roster is being shaken up so hard.
> I for example main Morde top and he's my go to top laner. What am I supposed to play now? I adapted my playtyle to fit into top so should I disregard everything I've learned to play bot lane or simply forget about ever wanting to play my favorite champion again?
> 
> 2. I'd love to get some changes for Morde. I really do. Changes that actually strengthen his thematic and gameplay appeal and build on his character. Making him more enjoyable, healthier and overall more unique rather than reworkin one sigle ability, nerfing some others and calling it a day, not really addressing flaws and strengths and missing his personality by far.

1. It's obvious you'll have to adapt? When Nidalee was changed into a jungler that made me pick up jungling in general because that was my weakest role, but I still liked playing Nidalee. Was it inconvenient? Yes; but I'm not going to quit the whole game just because one champion was changed, favorite or not. 

2. This point of yours really suggests that you haven't been keeping up on the pbe posts, and haven't even played him on the pbe. 

It's your choice if you want to quit league, but I'm going to be honest and say you're overreacting like a whole bunch of people have done before with other champions that turned out fine. {{champion:45}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:114}}

{{champion:45}}  Is not fine, he's in a underwhelming spot at the moment.

But at least he wasn't gutted.

Unlike {{champion:82}} .

> [{quoted}](name=Flip Flop Mist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000a0000000000020002,timestamp=2015-08-12T17:31:23.760+0000)
>
> {{champion:45}}  Is not fine, he's in a underwhelming spot at the moment.
> 
> But at least he wasn't gutted.
> 
> Unlike {{champion:82}} .

He's really underestimated. He could probably use some casting time QoL buffs, but that's about it.

He's underwhelming at the moment, but certainly playable and is in a good enough spot to not be a glaring issue like some other champs, but he could use a little help in a number of places. His spells being canceled if he dies are a gripe but again, not as bad as Morde's Feast or Famine issue. Veigar, even if he does bad in lane and didn't farm well enough, can still use his ult to turn an enemy's AP against them, and control the flow of fights with his stun.

> [{quoted}](name=DJ Di0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000a000000000002,timestamp=2015-08-12T16:06:39.055+0000)
>
> 1. It's obvious you'll have to adapt? When Nidalee was changed into a jungler that made me pick up jungling in general because that was my weakest role, but I still liked playing Nidalee. Was it inconvenient? Yes; but I'm not going to quit the whole game just because one champion was changed, favorite or not. 
> 
> 2. This point of yours really suggests that you haven't been keeping up on the pbe posts, and haven't even played him on the pbe. 
> 
> It's your choice if you want to quit league, but I'm going to be honest and say you're overreacting like a whole bunch of people have done before with other champions that turned out fine. {{champion:45}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:114}}

1. Lane Nidalee still functions though, or am I mistaken? I'd be fine with morde top not being as great as he'd be bot but the W change would be practically like making Nidalee's traps only work on Jungle creeps or her heal only being able to be cast on allied champs. 
Would that feel good? Heck no!

2. I've watched every single piece of PBE footage I could salvage, I've done the math with every build combination I deemed could be viable on Morde and yeah, I did read every Riot comment on the PBE boards and here. Guess what the common consensus regarding the Morde rework is?
And heck, I'd gladly discuss the Morde changes in detail with some rioters but they outright refuse to brush upon the topic and avoid it like the plague.
According to champion.gg Nidalee is the worst midlaner in the game. Literally.

> [{quoted}](name=DJ Di0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000a000000000002,timestamp=2015-08-12T16:06:39.055+0000)
>
> 1. It's obvious you'll have to adapt? When Nidalee was changed into a jungler that made me pick up jungling in general because that was my weakest role, but I still liked playing Nidalee. Was it inconvenient? Yes; but I'm not going to quit the whole game just because one champion was changed, favorite or not. 
> 
> 2. This point of yours really suggests that you haven't been keeping up on the pbe posts, and haven't even played him on the pbe. 
> 
> It's your choice if you want to quit league, but I'm going to be honest and say you're overreacting like a whole bunch of people have done before with other champions that turned out fine. {{champion:45}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:114}}

It is not so much that we have to adapt, it is more that we Mord players were forced into a lane that is very difficult to succeed in. If they gave us tools to do well then ok it would be more forgiving. But when MS, shield generation, range (specifically for Q, as before we could bounce it off a minion wave to hit our opponent), lane pushing power (E got nerfed to shit early game), overall early game got nerfed, it is a bit difficult to come out on top. 

They said that Mord has the defenses to survive down in bot lane. I am assuming they are talking about our shield. You know, the one that within 1-2 AA's is gone, the one that is difficult to get to begin with (minion generation was nerfed and it is difficult to hit enemy champs since we are so outranged). The added defenses we had on W are gone. Yea we can heal with W but, we have to be on top of eachother for it to work making it easier for our enemies to CC both of us (Braum, Nami, Sona).

I also hate that if/when I pick Mord ADC, I kind of force my support into a CC heavy champ. I do not want to force my teammates into picking a champ they are not the best/greatest at. If we want that sustained damage to towers or for teamfights? Mid or top has to grab an ADC to compensate for me picking Mord. I want to play the champs I enjoy, but do not want to dictate the rest of what my team plays (at my low elo people just play what they like, they don't base it around team comps).

The last, and most important aspect of why Mord players are upset, is that we are now gimped in any other lane. 1/4th of our kit is useless in lane. We have two abilities to trade with pre-6. It is one thing to give incentive for Mord to go duo lane, but another to FORCE him into it. That is whats the most upsetting from what I have seen (as well as personally feel). 

For the record, I HAVE played quite a few games with him on PBE. He can be powerful yes. But if your enemy bot lane is even somewhat competent, you will not be able to get the items you need to make an impact at all. Even if you do well, you still feel like a bit of a burden to your team if you took a "normal" ADC instead.
It's not about the new Morde being good or bad, is just that they are deleting current Morde to create a new one.
It sucks they gutted a champ, but I seriously hated playing versus Morde in lane.

> [{quoted}](name=VakraL,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-12T13:01:47.559+0000)
>
> It sucks they gutted a champ, but I seriously hated playing versus Morde in lane.

Sounds like a bit of personal bias to me. There is a half a roster worse to play against than him.

> [{quoted}](name=Azurasha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-08-12T13:05:16.658+0000)
>
> Sounds like a bit of personal bias to me. There is a half a roster worse to play against than him.

I'm saying it sucks they destroyed his main, even though I still hate Morde, it does blow to lose your favorite champ.

EDIT: I'd lane versus pretty much anybody over him in Mid. Only other person who is close to as annoying is Cass.

> [{quoted}](name=VakraL,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-08-12T13:07:57.186+0000)
>
> I'm saying it sucks they destroyed his main, even though I still hate Morde, it does blow to lose your favorite champ.
> 
> EDIT: I'd lane versus pretty much anybody over him in Mid. Only other person who is close to as annoying is Cass.

Heck, as a Morde main I know he's a pain in the ass to deal with but I'd rather have a full blown rework addressing the toxic parts rather than trying to be lazy and force him bot since they obviously don't have a clue how to balance him without a bigger scale rework.

His old identity was "do tons of damage and shield incoming damage".  He had no CC.  He had no mobility.  He had no levers other than damage and shield amounts that Riot could pull.  These types of champions can't really be balanced.  In order for their numbers to be strong enough to work against smart players, they have to be so strong that they just face roll anyone dumb enough to stand and fight them.  The only real solution is to change his kit somehow.  I feel terrible for Morde mains who were attached to the old Morde because this seems like a HUGE departure from his previous identity, but it seems like something was needed to put him in a healthier place.

and this has changed how? now he's even more reliant on an early snowball in order to be remotely relevant

tell me that dragon ghost is healthy for the game

tell me that his new Q is healthy for the game

you can't

I do have to admit, he is more playable than i thought at first.


However, he also feels incredibly clunky in several ways. As someone that mained Mordekaiser since i started playing this, i cant help but feel heart broken.


Thank you for everything, Mordekaiser. You were the funniest champion in the game for me and i will always treasure the fun we had together. Hopefully you will be changed at a later date into a state that actually feels smoothy.


It is funny, but i do not think new Mord is any more healthy to the game. His new Q is stupid as fuck, and clearly only there to make up for the rest of his nerfed kit, he is far more feast-and-famine than on live and will make your team rage just for being picked.

> [{quoted}](name=Matezoide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AwaarZfI,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-08-12T17:37:55.176+0000)

plz dont laugh, that overgrown lizard likes to completely ignore my commands even when i am nearby.


Cant even abuse the fact it doesnt have a leash range and back while it takes a jungle camp because the damn thing will randomly stop attacking and sit on his god damn ass until i tell him to continue.


The rework isnt very good to begin with, but i want the damn mechanic to actually work if they are going to destroy my favorite champion.


At least his new ability icons are badass, outside of W.

F to pay respects. 

RIP Mordekaiser, you got a worse "compensation" than Veigar
*Presses F*
so long morde, you were my guilty pleasure for mid and top ~

I'm not a Mordekaiser player, but as a Sona main since the end of season 3, I can feel your pain, I know how it hurts


Take my upvote :)

Pentakill Botlane anyone?

{{champion:25}} : "Feel my pain"

Seriously though, I appreciate all the reassuring statements coming from you guys. Helps a lot :)

When is the zed/lee sin rework?  

Oh wait, popularity = healthy now.... in maybe 1000 games, ive seen morde *maybe* 20 times, yet he gets this.  I see zed picked or banned almost always and he gets his attack speed scratched....  

That's what's sick.  People learn champions and roles, then have to relearn EVERYTHING by niche selection of the "esport's" management.... which is TOTALLY unfair and unjust to any veteran main of these.... "reworks".  A sport should be an even playing field, not this...
Rip Mordekaiser.  Stay safe forever in our huerts.
let us remember those who have fallen {{champion:38}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:82}} RIP

Rest in Pepperoni, Paladin of Pain.

May you always have an infinite supply of cheesy breadsticks to complement your pizza feet in the dark hell of bad design CertainlyT has cast you into with no regards for your player's feeling.
I want to see a picture of Veigar & Kassadin patting Mordekaiser on the back. Maybe Lee Sin partying in the background.
I'd be more worried about the upcoming bruiser itemization
I wouldn't be. It'll all get nerfed into the ground after people start playing tank Rengar again.
Its CertainlyT. You expected him to listen or change anything?
As a former main of Leblanc i feel your pain.  sorry man, don't worry though.  there's lots of cools team games.  rocket league is a lot of fun and much more stress free.
